input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
WeatherTech Custom Fit Cargo Liners for Lexus RX, Tan

Item specifications:
Provides complete trunk/cargo area protection
Computer designed to fit your vehicle
Raised lip to keep spills/dirt/grease off interior
Made from proprietary custom blended tpo
Textured finish which helps to keep cargo stable
Flexible under extreme temperatures

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The WeatherTech Cargo Liners provide complete trunk/cargo area protection. The Cargo Liners are computer designed to fit your vehicle and have a raised lip to keep spills, dirt and grease off your vehicle's interior, and they are flexible under extreme temperatures. The Cargo Liner features a textured finish that helps to keep cargo from shifting. The WeatherTech Cargo Liners are custom tailored to fit your vehicle and are designed to provide complete trunk/ cargo area protection.
input_text.Response B: Our WeatherTech custom fit cargo liners, for Lexus RX, are computer designed to fit your vehicle and have a raised lip to keep spills, dirt and grease off your vehicle's interior, protecting your carpeting from normal wear and tear. These liners are wear resistant and remain flexible under temperature extremes. The WeatherTech Tan Cargo Liner features a textured finish which helps to keep cargo from shifting, and is perfect for hauling just about anything from gardening supplies to construction materials to the family pet.  Made from proprietary custom blended TPO.

label_annotations.feedback: Both are very good. Not much I can say about them.
